alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Inland Nassau; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 4:29PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Nassau and Duval Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 429 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Callahan, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Callahan, Jacksonville International Arpt, Arlington, Atlantic Beach, Neptune Beach, Mayport, Cisco Gardens, Ortega and Craig Field. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Inland Nassau; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Duval
